verses.verse: Then I <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> the <S%H7549>firmament<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> there <S%H7200>appeared<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them as it were a <S%H5601>sapphire<s%> <S%H68>stone,<s%> as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of a <S%H3678>throne.<s%>

And he <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H906>linen,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Go <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H1534>wheels,<s%> even <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H3742>cherub,<s%> and <S%H4390>fill<s%> thine <S%H2651>hand<s%> with <S%H1513>coals<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> from <S%H4480>between<s%> <S%H996><s%> the <S%H3742>cherubims,<s%> and <S%H2236>scatter<s%> them <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%> And he <S%H935>went<s%> in in my <S%H5869>sight.<s%>

Now the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> on the right <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H3225><s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> when the <S%H376>man<s%> went <S%H935>in;<s%> and the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2691>court.<s%>

Then the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> went <S%H7311>up<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H3742>cherub,<s%> and stood <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4670>threshold<s%> of the <S%H1004>house;<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> was <S%H4390>filled<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> and the <S%H2691>court<s%> was <S%H4390>full<s%> <S%H854>of<s%> the <S%H5051>brightness<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H3519>glory.<s%>

And the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherubims'<s%> <S%H3671>wings<s%> was <S%H8085>heard<s%> even <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> as the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> when he <S%H1696>speaketh.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that when he had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H906>linen,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> from <S%H4480>between<s%> <S%H996><s%> the <S%H1534>wheels,<s%> from <S%H4480>between<s%> <S%H996><s%> the <S%H3742>cherubims;<s%> then he went <S%H935>in,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H212>wheels.<s%>

And one <S%H3742>cherub<s%> stretched <S%H7971>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> from <S%H4480>between<s%> <S%H996><s%> the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubims,<s%> and <S%H5375>took<s%> thereof, and <S%H5414>put<s%> it <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H2651>hands<s%> of him that was <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H906>linen:<s%> who <S%H3947>took<s%> it, and went <S%H3318>out.<s%>
And there <S%H7200>appeared<s%> in the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> the <S%H8403>form<s%> of a <S%H120>man's<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> their <S%H3671>wings.<s%>

And when I <S%H7200>looked,<s%> <S%H2009>behold<s%> the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H212>wheels<s%> <S%H681>by<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubims,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H212>wheel<s%> <S%H681>by<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3742>cherub,<s%> and <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H212>wheel<s%> <S%H681>by<s%> <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H3742>cherub:<s%> and the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H212>wheels<s%> was as the <S%H5869>color<s%> of a <S%H8658>beryl<s%> <S%H68>stone.<s%>

And as for their <S%H4758>appearances,<s%> they <S%H702>four<s%> had <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1823>likeness,<s%> as <S%H834>if<s%> a <S%H212>wheel<s%> had <S%H1961>been<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of a <S%H212>wheel.<s%>

When they <S%H1980>went,<s%> they <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> their <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7253>sides;<s%> they <S%H5437>turned<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> as they <S%H1980>went,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H6437>looked<s%> they <S%H1980>followed<s%> <S%H310><s%> it; they <S%H5437>turned<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> as they <S%H1980>went.<s%>

And their <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H1320>body,<s%> and their <S%H1354>backs,<s%> and their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and their <S%H3671>wings,<s%> and the <S%H212>wheels,<s%> were <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H5869>eyes<s%> round <S%H5439>about,<s%> even the <S%H212>wheels<s%> that they <S%H702>four<s%> had.
As for the <S%H212>wheels,<s%> it was <S%H7121>cried<s%> unto them in my <S%H241>hearing,<s%> O <S%H1534>wheel.<s%>

And every <S%H259>one<s%> had <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6440>faces:<s%> the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> was the <S%H6440>face<s%> of a <S%H3742>cherub,<s%> and the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> was the <S%H6440>face<s%> of a <S%H120>man,<s%> and the <S%H7992>third<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of a <S%H738>lion,<s%> and the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of an <S%H5404>eagle.<s%>
And the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> were lifted <S%H7426>up.<s%> <S%H1931>This<s%> is the living <S%H2416>creature<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> of <S%H3529>Chebar.<s%>

And when the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> <S%H1980>went,<s%> the <S%H212>wheels<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H681>by<s%> them: and when the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H3671>wings<s%> to mount <S%H7311>up<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> the <S%H1992>same<s%> <S%H212>wheels<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5437>turned<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> from <S%H4480>beside<s%> <S%H681><s%> them.

When they <S%H5975>stood,<s%> these <S%H5975>stood;<s%> and when they were lifted <S%H7311>up,<s%> these lifted <S%H7426>up<s%> themselves also: <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the living <S%H2416>creature<s%> was in them.

Then the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3318>departed<s%> from <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H4670>threshold<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubims.<s%>

And the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H3671>wings,<s%> and mounted <S%H7426>up<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight:<s%> when they went <S%H3318>out,<s%> the <S%H212>wheels<s%> also were <S%H5980>beside<s%> them, and every one <S%H5975>stood<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H6931>east<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H1004>house;<s%> and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was <S%H5921>over<s%> them <S%H4480>above.<s%> <S%H4605><s%>

This <S%H1931><s%> is the living <S%H2416>creature<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> of <S%H3529>Chebar;<s%> and I <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> were the <S%H3742>cherubims.<s%>

Every <S%H259>one<s%> had four faces <S%H702>apiece,<s%> <S%H702><s%> <S%H6440><s%> and every <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3671>wings;<s%> and the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%> was <S%H8478>under<s%> their <S%H3671>wings.<s%>

And the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of their <S%H6440>faces<s%> was the <S%H1992>same<s%> <S%H6440>faces<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H5104>river<s%> of <S%H3529>Chebar,<s%> their <S%H4758>appearances<s%> and themselves: they <S%H1980>went<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> straight <S%H413>forward.<s%> <S%H5676><s%> <S%H6440><s%>
